sentence.Network_en: Most reform proposals to date, however, still envisage a permanent federal backstop.
sentence.Network_cn: 然而到目前为止的所有改革提案都仍然假设政府会永久性地托盘.

sentence.Network_en: He acted as a backstop in case anything went wrong.
sentence.Network_cn: 他充当棒球捕手,以防出现任何差错.

sentence.Network_en: The government recently introduced an insurance program to backstop money funds.
sentence.Network_cn: 政府最近提出了一项保险计划,以支持货币基金.
